txt.en: Mainio, a Man of the north, has sent word south with traders -- against his elders wishes -- that his people are in need of aid.\n\nRumour of these messages has come to you, and you should seek Mainio in Forochel outside the Lossoth camp of Kauppa-k√∂ti in the place known as Taur Orthon.
'You have come because of my messages? This is good to know.\n\n'You are a strange-looking person. I am sorry...I am glad that you are here to help.'
You received a request for assistance in the snow-covered land of Forochel.
Taur Orthon is north of Ost Forod in Evendim in the frozen land of Forochel. Mainio awaits aid outside the camp.\n\nYou should find Mainio and offer your assistance.
Talk to Mainio at Taur Orthon in Forochel
Taur Orthon is north of Ost Forod in Evendim in the frozen land of Forochel. Mainio awaits aid outside the camp.\n\nYou should find Mainio and offer your assistance.
